scripts.watch: npm run build && tsc-watch --onSuccess "npm run start"
scripts.start:dev: cd build && cross-env PROD=0 node server.js
scripts.start:prod: cd build && cross-env PROD=1 node server.js
scripts.build:deploy: rm -rf build && mkdir build && tsc && (cd ../front && npm run build)
scripts.start:deploy: cd build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start server.js
